# tackle

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This package contains personal utility functions for data analysis. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of *tackle* like so:

``` r
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("wmoldham/tackle")
```
